sentences.text: NOTICE OF 2017 ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS To Be Held May 31, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice is hereby given that the Annual Meeting of Stockholders of Under Armour, Inc. will be held on Wednesday, May 31, 2017 at 10:00 a.m., Eastern Time, at the companys office located at 2601 Port Covington Drive, Baltimore, Maryland 21230 to consider and vote on the following matters:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. To elect ten directors nominated by the Board of Directors to serve until the next Annual Meeting of Stockholder and until their respective successors are elected and qualified;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. To approve, on an advisory basis, our executive compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. To approve, on an advisory basis, the frequency of future advisory votes on our executive compensation; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. To ratify the appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for the year ending December 31, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will also transact any other business that may properly come before the meeting or any adjournment or postponement thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors recommends that you vote FOR the election of the ten nominees listed in the accompanying proxy statement to the Board of Directors, FOR the approval of our executive compensation, for ONE YEAR as the frequency of future advisory votes on our executive compensation and FOR the ratification of the appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only holders of record of Class A Common Stock or Class B Common Stock as of the close of business on March 17 2017 are entitled to notice of, or to vote at, the Annual Meeting and any adjournment or postponement thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holders of Class C Common Stock have no voting power as to any items of business that may properly be brought before the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with our Bylaws, for ten days prior to the Annual Meeting, a list of those stockholders entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting will be available for inspection at the office of the Secretary, Under Armour, Inc., 2601 Port Covington Drive, Baltimore, Maryland 21230.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This list also will be available at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All stockholders are invited to attend the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a stockholder of record as of the March 17, 2017 record date, you will be admitted to the meeting if you present a form of photo identification.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you own stock beneficially, such as through a bank or broker, you will be admitted to the meeting if you present a form of photo identification and proof of ownership or a valid proxy signed by the record holder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A recent brokerage statement or a letter from a bank or broker are examples of proof of ownership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you intend to be present in person at the Annual Meeting, please vote your shares promptly by following the voting instructions that you have received.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Order of the Board of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: John Stanton Senior Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Baltimore, Maryland April 13, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROXY STATEMENT ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS Wednesday, May  31, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: GENERAL INFORMATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proxy Statement is being provided to solicit proxies on behalf of the Board of Directors of Under Armour, Inc. for use at the Annual Meeting of Stockholders and at any adjournment or postponement thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The meeting is to be held on Wednesday, May 31, 2017, at 10:00 a.m., Eastern Time, at the companys office located at 2601 Port Covington Drive, Baltimore, Maryland 21230.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We expect to first send or give to stockholders this Proxy Statement, together with our 2016 Annual Report to Stockholders, on approximately April 18, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our principal offices are located at 1020 Hull Street, Baltimore, Maryland 21230.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this Proxy Statement we refer to Under Armour, Inc. as Under Armour, we, us, our or the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Internet Availability of Proxy Materials
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to rules of the Securities and Exchange Commission, or SEC, we are making our proxy materials available to our stockholders electronically over the Internet rather than mailing the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, we are sending a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials to our holders of Class A Common Stock and Class B Common Stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All stockholders will have the ability to access the proxy materials, including this Proxy Statement and our 2016 Annual Report to Stockholders, on the website referred to in the notice or to request a printed set of the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instructions on how to access the proxy materials over the Internet or to request a printed copy may be found on the notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, stockholders may request to receive proxy materials in printed form by mail or electronically by email on an ongoing basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The SEC rules require us to notify all stockholders, including those stockholders to whom we have mailed proxy materials, of the availability of our proxy materials over the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Important Notice Regarding the Availability of Proxy Materials for the Stockholder Meeting to be held on May 31, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Proxy Statement and 2016 Annual Report to Stockholders are available at
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: http://investor.underarmour.com/annuals.cfm
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who May Vote
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only holders of record of our Class A Common Stock, which we refer to as Class A Stock, and holders of record of our Class B Convertible Common Stock, which we refer to as Class B Stock, at the close of business on March 17, 2017, or the Record Date, will be entitled to notice of, and to vote at, the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On the Record Date, 184,667,304 shares of Class A Stock and 34,450,000 shares of Class B Stock were issued and outstanding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each share of Class A Stock entitles the holder to cast one vote on each matter to be considered at the Annual Meeting and each share of Class B Stock entitles the holder to cast ten votes on each matter to be considered at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holders of Class A Stock and holders of Class B Stock will vote together as a single class on all matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders are not allowed to cumulate their votes in the election of the directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holders of our Class C Common Stock, which we refer to as Class C Stock, have no voting power as to any items of business that will be voted on at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What Constitutes a Quorum
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders may not take action at a meeting unless there is a quorum present at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holders of Class A Stock and Class B Stock entitled to cast a majority of all the votes entitled to be cast at the Annual Meeting, represented in person or by proxy, constitute a quorum for the transaction of business at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Vote Required
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The election of each director requires a plurality of the votes cast at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The approval of our executive compensation and the ratification of the appointment of our independent registered public accounting firm each requires the affirmative vote of a majority of the votes cast at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to the vote on the frequency of future advisory votes on our executive compensation, you are not voting to approve or disapprove the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rather, you are voting to indicate your preference as to the frequency of future advisory votes on our executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The option of one year, two years or three years that receives a majority of all the votes cast on this proposal will be the frequency for the advisory vote on executive compensation that has been recommended by stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event that no option receives a majority of the votes cast, we will consider the option that receives the most votes to be the option selected by stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The board will take into consideration the outcome of the vote in setting a policy with respect to the frequency of future advisory votes on our executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting Process
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares for which proxies are properly executed and returned will be voted at the Annual Meeting in accordance with the directions given or, in the absence of directions, will be voted FOR the election of the ten nominees to the Board of Directors named in this Proxy Statement, FOR the advisory approval of our executive compensation, for ONE YEAR as the advisory vote on the frequency of future advisory votes on our executive compensation and FOR the ratification of the appointment of our independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is not expected that any other matters will be brought before the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If, however, other matters are properly presented, the persons named as proxies in the proxy card will vote in accordance with their discretion with respect to such matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The manner in which your shares may be voted depends on how your shares are held.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are the record holder of your shares, meaning you appear as the stockholder of your shares on the records of our stock transfer agent, you vote your shares directly through one of the methods described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you own shares in street name, meaning you are a beneficial owner with your shares held through a bank or brokerage firm, you instruct your bank or brokerage firm how to vote your shares through the methods described on the voting instruction form provided by your bank or brokerage firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How to Vote
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holders of our Class A Stock and Class B Stock as of the Record Date may vote their shares by one of the following methods.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Internet
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To vote your shares by Internet, please visit the website listed on your Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials, or the enclosed proxy card or voting instruction form, and follow the
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: on-screen instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will need the control number included on your Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials, proxy card or voting instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you vote by Internet, you do not need to mail your proxy card or voting instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Telephone
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a paper proxy card or voting instruction form and would like to vote your shares by telephone, please follow the instructions on the proxy card or voting instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you vote by telephone, you do not need to mail your proxy card or voting instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mail
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a paper proxy card or voting instruction form and would like to vote your shares by mail, please follow the instructions on the proxy card or voting instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please be sure to sign and date your proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not sign your proxy card, your votes cannot be counted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mail your proxy card or voting instruction form in the pre-addressed, postage-paid envelope.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In Person
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may also attend the Annual Meeting and vote in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you own your stock in street name and wish to vote your shares at the Annual Meeting, you must obtain a legal proxy from the bank or brokerage firm that holds your shares You should contact your bank or brokerage account representative to obtain a legal proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, to ensure your shares are represented, we ask that you vote your shares by Internet, telephone or mail, even if you plan to attend the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Attendance at the Annual Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holders of our Class A Stock, Class B Stock and Class C Stock may attend the Annual Meeting in person, although holders of Class C Stock will not be entitled to vote on any matter to be considered at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are the record holder of your shares, you will be required to present a form of photo identification for admission to the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you own your stock in street name, you may attend the Annual Meeting in person provided that you present a form of photo identification and proof of ownership, such as a recent brokerage statement or a letter from a bank or broker.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directions to the Annual Meeting are available at http://investor.underarmour.com/annuals.cfm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Revocation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are the record holder of your shares, you may revoke or cancel a previously granted proxy at any time before the Annual Meeting by delivering to the Secretary of Under Armour at 2601 Port Covington Drive, Baltimore, Maryland 21230, a written notice of revocation or a duly executed proxy bearing a later date, or by attending the Annual Meeting and voting in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any stockholder owning shares in street name may change or revoke previously given voting instructions by contacting the bank or brokerage firm holding the shares or by obtaining a legal proxy from the bank or brokerage firm and voting in person at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your personal attendance at the meeting does not revoke your proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your last vote, prior to or at the Annual Meeting, is the vote that will be counted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and Broker Non-Votes
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares held by stockholders present at the Annual Meeting in person or by proxy who do not vote on a matter and ballots or proxies marked abstain or withheld on a matter will be counted as present at the meeting for quorum purposes, but will not be considered votes cast on the matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in street name through a bank or broker and you do not provide voting instructions before the Annual Meeting, your bank or broker may vote your shares under certain circumstances in accordance with NYSE rules that govern banks and brokers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These circumstances
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: include routine matters, such as the ratification of the appointment of our independent registered public accounting firm described in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thus, if you do not vote your shares with respect to these matters, your bank or broker may vote your shares on your behalf or leave your shares unvoted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The election of directors, the advisory approval of our executive compensation and the advisory vote on the frequency of future advisory votes on our executive compensation are not considered routine matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thus, if you do not vote your shares with respect to any of these matters, your bank or broker may not vote the shares, and your shares will be left unvoted on the matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker non-votes (which are shares represented by proxies, received from a bank or broker, that are not voted on a matter because the bank or broker did not receive voting instructions from the beneficial owner) will be treated the same as abstentions, which means they will be present at the Annual Meeting and counted toward the quorum, but they will not be counted as votes cast on the matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes will not have an effect on any of the proposals at this meeting because they will not be counted as votes cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Householding
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The SEC permits us to send a single set of proxy materials to any household at which two or more stockholders reside, unless contrary instructions have been received, but only if we provide advance notice and follow certain procedures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This process, referred to as householding, reduces the volume of duplicate information and reduces printing and mailing expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have not instituted householding for stockholders of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain brokerage firms may have instituted householding for beneficial owners of our common stock held through brokerage firms.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your family has multiple accounts holding our shares, you may have already received a householding notice from your broker.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please contact your broker directly if you have any questions or require additional copies of the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The broker will arrange for delivery of a separate copy of this Proxy Statement or our Annual Report promptly upon your written or oral request.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may decide at any time to revoke your decision to household and begin receiving multiple copies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Solicitation of Proxies
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We pay the cost of soliciting proxies for the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We solicit by mail and arrangements are made with brokerage houses and other custodians, nominees and fiduciaries to send proxy materials to beneficial owners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon request, we will reimburse them for their reasonable expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our directors, officers and employees may solicit proxies, either personally or by telephone, facsimile or written or electronic mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders are requested to return their proxies without delay.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CORPORATE GOVERNANCE AND RELATED MATTERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board of Directors and Board Leadership Structure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors has ten directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Of the current directors, nine are non-management directors, with 80% being independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If Ms. DeVard is elected to our Board of Directors, 90% of our directors will be independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Kevin Plank currently serves as Chief Executive Officer and Chairman of the Board for our company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe combining the roles of chairman and chief executive officer is currently the appropriate leadership model for our company as it provides for clear accountability and efficient and effective leadership of our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As our founder and our largest stockholder, with beneficial ownership of approximately 16% of our outstanding stock and majority voting control of our company, we believe Mr. Plank is the appropriate person to lead both our Board and the management of our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, we implemented a series of changes to our stock and corporate governance that resulted in the creation of our Class C Stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On April 7, 2016, stockholders of record of our Class A Stock and Class B Stock received shares of Class C Stock on a one-for-one basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Among other things, these changes permit us to issue Class C Stock instead of Class A Stock through our equity incentive plans without further diluting the voting control of Mr. Plank, thereby prolonging our current governance structure, which we believe is important to our long-term growth and success.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lead Director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To further strengthen our corporate governance structure and provide independent oversight of our company, the Board has appointed Mr. Krongard as our lead independent director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As Lead Director, Mr. Krongard acts as a liaison between the non-management directors of the Board and Mr. Plank and the other members of our management team, chairs regular executive sessions of the Board without Mr. Plank present and performs other functions as requested by the non-management directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Role of Board in Risk Oversight
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors is responsible for the oversight of risk management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board delegates much of this responsibility to the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under its charter, the committees responsibilities include to inquire of management, our Vice President of Global Risk Management and our independent registered public accounting firm about significant financial risks or exposures, the companys processes and policies for risk assessment and the steps management has taken to mitigate these risks to the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee receives periodic reports from our Vice President of Global Risk Management on our enterprise risk management program and our risk mitigation efforts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee also oversees our legal and regulatory compliance programs and our internal audit function.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee has the responsibility to review the risks of our compensation policies and practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our full Board periodically reviews our financial and strategic plans and objectives, including the risks that may affect the achievement of these plans and objectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Ownership Guidelines
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors has adopted stock ownership guidelines to further align the financial interests of the companys executives and non-management directors with the interests of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The guidelines provide that executive officers should own company stock with a value at least equal to ten times annual base salary for the Chief Executive Officer, three times annual base salary for Executive Vice Presidents and one time annual base salary for all other executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The guidelines provide that non-management directors should own company stock with a value at least equal to three times the amount of the annual retainer paid to directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive officers are expected to achieve the stock ownership levels under these guidelines within five years of their hire or promotion to executive officer and non-management directors within three years of joining our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The companys stock ownership guidelines can be found on our website at www.uabiz.com, under Investors-Governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All executive officers and non-management directors are in compliance with the guidelines with the exception of persons new to their roles within the last few years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We anticipate these persons will be in compliance with the guidelines within the required time frame.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Kevin Plank, the companys Chief Executive Officer and Chairman of the Board, and our founder, currently has a base salary of $26,000, which was his approximate salary when he founded the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He owns 164,617 shares of Class A stock, 34,450,000 shares of Class B Stock and 33,802,857 shares of Class C Stock, valued at more than $1.27 billion as of the March 17, 2017 Record Date for the Annual Meeting of Stockholders, far above the multiple of ten times salary minimum ownership requirement, even assuming a significantly higher salary amount more typical for a Chief Executive Officer at a company of our size.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independence of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that the following eight directors are independent under the corporate governance listing standards of the New York Stock Exchange, or NYSE: George W. Bodenheimer, Douglas E. Coltharp, Anthony W. Deering, Karen W. Katz, A.B. Krongard, William R. McDermott, Eric T. Olson and Harvey L. Sanders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has also determined that Jerri L. DeVard, the nominee to the Board, is independent under the NYSE standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When determining the independence of the directors under NYSE standards, the Board considered certain company relationships.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. McDermott is the Chief Executive Officer and Executive Board member of SAP SE.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The company has standard industry license agreements for SAP software
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: and uses SAP for related support services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2015, the company also entered into an agreement with SAP to engage SAP to assist in an ongoing initiative that includes the implementation of SAPs Fashion Management software and enhancements to global business processes to help support the companys growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, between these two arrangements, we paid approximately $69.4 million to SAP, or approximately one-tenth of one percent of SAPs 2016 worldwide revenues of approximately 22 billion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that this relationship is not a material relationship and has no impact on Mr. McDermotts independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Kevin Plank is not independent because he is our Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Byron K. Adams, Jr., former Senior Advisor to the Chairman advising primarily on our digital business, is not independent because he served as an executive of the company within the last three years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Adams is not standing for re-election at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our charter includes additional factors for the Board to consider when determining whether a director will be independent under the NYSE standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specifically, the Board must consider whether any of the independent directors have any material financial or service relationship with Mr. Plank or any of his family members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has considered hese factors and determined that neither the current independent directors nor Ms. DeVard have any such relationships.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A copy of our charter that includes these requirements is available through our website at www.uabiz.com, under Investors-Governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The functions performed by these standing committees are summarized below, and are set forth in more detail in their charters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The complete text of the charters for each standing committee can be found on our website at www.uabiz.com, under Investors-Governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that each member of the Audit, Compensation and Governance committees is independent as required under NYSE listing standards and our charter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Krongard serves as the chairman of the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This committee assists the Board of Directors with oversight of matters relating to accounting, internal control, auditing, financial reporting, risk and legal and regulatory compliance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee oversees the audit and other services provided by our independent registered public accounting firm and is directly responsible for the appointment, independence, qualifications, compensation and oversight of the independent registered public accounting firm, which reports directly to the committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee also oversees the internal audit function for Under Armour and is responsible for the appointment of the Director of Internal Audit, who reports directly to the committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee Report for 2016 is included in this Proxy Statement under Audit Committee Report.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that all the committee members are independent, financially literate and qualify as audit committee financial experts under SEC rules and NYSE listing standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Sanders serves as the chairman of the Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This committee approves the compensation of our Chief Executive Officer, or CEO, and our other executive officers, administers our executive benefit plans, including the granting of stock options, restricted stock units and other awards under our equity incentive plans, and advises the Board on director compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to its charter, the committee may delegate any of its responsibilities to a subcommittee comprised of one or more members of the committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the committee has not delegated any such responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our CEO and other senior executives evaluate the performance of our executive officers and make recommendations to the Compensation Committee concerning their compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee considers these evaluations and recommendations, and its evaluation of the CEO in determining the compensation of our CEO and our other executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to its charter, the Compensation Committee has the authority to obtain advice and assistance from advisors, including compensation consultants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the committee engaged the services of an independent compensation consultant, Willis Towers Watson, or WTW, to provide executive compensation consulting services to the committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This independent consultant reports directly to the committee and the committee retains sole authority to retain and terminate the consulting relationship.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In carrying out its responsibilities, the independent consultant collaborates with management to obtain data, provide background on compensation programs and practices, and clarify pertinent information.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee obtained from the independent consultant competitive market data on compensation for executives to assess generally the competitiveness of our executive compensation and the general design of our annual cash incentive plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The competitive market data was based on a peer group and WTWs published industry survey data.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee has not relied on the independent consultant to determine or recommend the amount or form of executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, management separately engaged WTW for consulting services related to design of the companys compensation for equity-eligible employees (excluding our executive officers).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This engagement was reviewed and pre-approved by the Compensation Committee, and the committee did not consider this engagement to compromise the independence of WTW.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The total compensation paid to WTW for these management consulting services in 2016 was $129,542.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional information concerning the processes and procedures for the consideration and determination of executive officer compensation is included in the Compensation Discussion and Analysis section of this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee Report for 2016 is included under the Compensation Committee Report section of this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A description of the compensation program for our non-management directors, including updates to the program for 2017, is included below under the Compensation of Directors section of this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In late 2016, at the request of the Compensation Committee Chairman, management researched director compensation practices of competitor companies and reviewed the data with the committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee also reviewed a summary of published third party surveys on public company director compensation practices of similarly sized companies and director compensation of industry peers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In early 2017, the Compensation Committee reviewed the risks of our compensation policies and practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The companys Vice President of Global Risk Management conducted a risk assessment of our compensation policies and practices for all employees and this assessment was reviewed by the committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The risk assessment included a review of our material compensation programs, the structure and nature of these programs, the short-term and long-term performance incentive targets used in these programs and how they relate to our business plans and creating stockholder value, corporate governance policies with respect to our compensation programs, and other aspects of our compensation programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on this review and assessment, we concluded that the risks related to our compensation policies and practices are not reasonably likely to have a material adverse effect on our company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. McDermott serves as the chairman of the Corporate Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This committee identifies ndividuals qualified to become members of our Board of Directors, recommends candidates for election or reelection to our Board, oversees the evaluation of our Board, and advises our Board regarding committee composition and structure and other corporate governance matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee also periodically reviews succession planning for our Chief Executive Officer and other senior executive positions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Finance and Capital Planning Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Coltharp serves as the chairman of the Finance and Capital Planning Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This committee assists our Board in overseeing the financial and capital investment policies, planning and activities of the company in support of our long-range goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Identifying and Evaluating Director Candidates
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee recommends to the Board candidates to fill vacancies or for election or reelection to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board then appoints new Board members to fill vacancies or nominates candidates each year for election or reelection by stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee does not have a specific written policy or process regarding the nominations of directors, nor does it maintain minimum standards for director nominees other than as set forth in the committees charter as described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committees charter requires the committee to establish criteria for selecting new directors, which reflects at a minimum a candidates strength of character, judgment, business experience, specific areas of expertise, factors relating to the composition of the Board, including its size and structure, and principles of diversity, including gender and ethnicity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee also considers the statutory requirements applicable to the composition of the Board and its committees, including the independence requirements of the NYSE.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For a discussion of the specific experience, qualifications, attributes or skills of the nominees for election to the Board, see the Election of Directors section of this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: not established term limits for directors because of the concern that term limits may deprive the company and its shareholders of the contribution of directors who have been able to develop valuable insights into the company and its operations over time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our corporate governance guidelines do provide that a director is expected not to stand for reelection after the age of 75.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee recommended the Board nominate Mr. Krongard, age 80, for reelection to the Board based on his continued strong leadership and service on the Board both as Audit Committee Chairman and Lead Director, and the Board agreed with this recommendation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee does not have a formal policy with regard to the consideration of diversity, including gender and ethnicity, in identifying director nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with the committees charter, when identifying director nominees, the committee considers general principles of diversity, and does so in the broadest sense, considering diversity in terms of business leadership, experience, industry background and geography, as well as gender and ethnicity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee strives for directors who represent a mix of backgrounds and experiences that will enhance the quality of the boards deliberations and oversight of our business, and as our business expands we hope to attract directors with a broader range of backgrounds and experiences.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee periodically considers criteria for identifying possible new director candidates as needed, in consultation with the CEO and Chairman of the Board and other members of the Board and management, and works with management and other members of the Board in recruiting new candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Candidates identified through his process are considered by the full committee for possible recommendation to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From time to time the committee uses the services of a third party search firm to assist it in identifying and screening candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A third party search firm identified and recommended Ms. DeVard as a potential candidate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Corporate Governance Committee will consider director candidates suggested by stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any stockholder who wishes to recommend a director candidate for consideration by the committee may do so by submitting he name and qualifications of the candidate to the chairman of the committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See Communications with Directors above for how to communicate with the chairman of the committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our bylaws include requirements for direct nominations by a stockholder of persons for election to our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These requirements are described under Stockholder Proposals at the end of this Proxy Statement.

sentences.text: EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Discussion and Analysis
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following is a discussion and analysis of our compensation policies and decisions regarding the 2016 compensation for our executive officers named in the compensation tables in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Summary and Highlights for 2016
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016 nearly 100% of the annual compensation potential for our Chief Executive Officer, or CEO, Kevin Plank and a substantial portion of the annual compensation potential for our other executive officers was directly tied to the financial performance of our company, primarily through:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: our annual cash incentive plan with awards earned based on our financial performance in 2016; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: our annual performance based restricted stock unit and stock option awards (the performance based equity awards) for 2016 with vesting tied to our financial performance in 2016 and 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our financial performance in 2016 resulted in a significant reduction to incentive awards and to performance based equity awards realized by our executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While we achieved our net revenue target under our annual cash incentive plan for 2016, growing net revenues by 22% over 2015 to $4.83 billion, our operating income grew 2% to $417.5 million for 2016, which was below the targets set forth under the plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, our Compensation Committee approved no annual incentive award for Mr. Plank, and annual incentive awards for other executive officers which were well below the target award levels under the plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The performance targets for the performance based equity awards granted in 2016 were adjusted operating income targets set at levels designed to require meaningful operating income growth in 2016 and 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As discussed in more detail below, given changes to our business plans following the grant of these 2016 awards, we no longer expect these 2016 awards to ultimately vest in future years, therefore delivering no value to our executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See Equity AwardsPerformance Based Equity Awards for 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to the substantial portion of compensation tied to performance, other elements of our compensation for our executive officers that we believe are aligned with best practices and contribute to a reasonable compensation program include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: commencing with equity awards granted in 2014, a change from automatic vesting upon a change in control (generally referred to as single trigger) to vesting following a change in control only if employment is terminated without cause or for good reason (generally referred to as double trigger);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: limited other severance protections, with the protections primarily following a change in control and only if employment is terminated without cause or for good reason (again, generally referred to as double trigger);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: clawback provisions in our annual cash incentive plan (beginning in 2013) and in our long-term incentive plan (beginning for performance based equity awards in 2015) requiring our company to seek to recover awards under these plans for improper conduct as required under applicable law;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: no pension or supplemental retirement plan;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: no company contributions to our deferred compensation plan in 2016 for any executive officer;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: limited other benefits and perquisites for these executives;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: no employment agreements with our executive officers (other than an agreement with Mr. Maurath, our Chief Revenue Officer, as required under local law, and Mr. Lee, whose employment agreement was entered into in connection with our acquisition of our MyFitnessPal business in 2015);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: stock ownership guidelines for our executive officers designed to encourage our executives to retain meaningfu levels of our stock to further align their interests with the interests of our stockholders; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a prohibition on hedging of Under Armour shares, with no director or executive officer having any shares pledged as security.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Advisory Vote to Approve Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At our 2016 Annual Meeting of Stockholders we held an advisory vote to approve executive compensation, commonly eferred to as say on pay.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee values the opinions expressed by stockholders in these votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While these votes are advisory and non-binding, the Compensation Committee and the Board review the voting results and seek to determine the cause or causes of any significant negative voting result.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting results provide little detail by hemselves, and we may consult directly with stockholders to better understand issues and concerns not previously presented.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our stockholders overwhelmingly approved our say on pay proposal at our 2016 Annual Meeting of Stockholders, with more than 99% of the votes cast voting to approve our executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee reviewed the voting results and, given the strong level of support, did not make any changes to our executive compensation program or principles in response to the vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee will continue to consider results from the annual say on pay advisory vote, including the results from the upcoming 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders, as well as other stockholder input, when reviewing executive compensation programs, principles and policies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Objectives of our Compensation Program
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The overall objectives of our compensation program for our executive officers are to attract and retain highly qualified executives committed to our brand and our mission, to motivate our executives to build and grow our business profitably, and to align the interests of our executives with the interests of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation program is designed to reward our executives for growth in our net revenues and operating income, primarily through our annual cash incentive plan and our performance based equity awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our equity awards incentivize our executive officers to generate positive returns for our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation consists primarily of:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: salary;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: an annual cash incentive award based primarily on the annual performance of the company;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: equity awards, including our annual performance based equity award with the amount eligible to vest tied to the performance of the company; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: minimal benefits and perquisites.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We do not offer pension or other retirement plans for executives, other than a 401(k) plan that is offered to our employees generally.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have a deferred compensation plan pursuant to which executives may defer certain compensation; however we did not make any company contributions to this plan in 2016 for any executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Decision-Making Process
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Committee review process
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In early 2017, in conjunction with the approval of the 2016 annual cash incentive plan awards and 2017 salaries and annual equity awards for executive officers, the Compensation Committee reviewed tally sheets relating to executive officer compensation that were prepared by management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The tally sheets included:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: summary compensation information for 2014 through 2016;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the value realized upon exercise of stock options and vesting of restricted stock in 2016;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the value of outstanding stock options, restricted stock units and unrestricted stock held at the end of 2016, and as of early 2017; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: balances and investment returns under our deferred compensation plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee reviewed similar tally sheet data in early 2016 in conjunction with the approval of 2016 salaries and annual equity awards for executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In early 2016, the Compensation Committee engaged the services of Willis Towers Watson, or WTW, to provide executive compensation consulting services to the committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee obtained from WTW competitive market data on compensation for executives to assess generally the competitiveness of our executive compensation, as well as an analysis of the design of our annual cash incentive plan, including the metrics used and performance and payout ranges.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The competitive market data was based on a peer group and published industry survey data from WTWs Genera Industry Executive Compensation and Retail/Wholesale Executive Compensation Databases.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The peer group was developed by management based on publicly traded companies within the apparel and footwear industries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Some of the companies within the peer group we may compete with for talent or compare our performance against from time to time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following companies were included in the peer group: Abercrombie & Fitch Co., American Eagle Outfitters, Inc., Coach, Inc., Columbia Sportswear Company, Deckers Outdoor Corporation, lululemon athletica inc., Michael Kors Holdings Limited, Nike, Inc., Quiksilver, Inc., Ralph Lauren Corporation, Urban Outfitters, Inc., V.F. Corporation and Wolverine World Wide, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee did not target compensation at or near any particular percentile ranking within the peer group or industry survey data, or otherwise use this competitive market data to determine the amount or form of executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rather the committee used this data as a general assessment of the competitiveness of our executive compensation program and the design of our annual cash incentive plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Following a similar assessment in 2015, the committee determined it was appropriate to increase certain award levels under our annual cash incentive plan in two stepsonce in 2015, and again in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Following its review of updated information in early 2016, the committee determined it was appropriate to proceed with the planned 2016 increase.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the committee determined that our executive compensation was reasonable when compared to the peer group and industry data.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As discussed throughout this Compensation Discussion and Analysis section, the committee considers many factors in the determination of executive compensation levels, including the executives prior experience, the position and level of responsibility with the company and company and individual performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Managements role in determining compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As discussed throughout this Compensation Discussion and Analysis section, our management makes recommendations to the Compensation Committee on salaries, annual incentive awards and other types of compensation for executive officers, other than our CEO, Kevin Plank.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Plank, with
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: input from other senior executives, has generally recommended the salaries, annual incentive awards and equity awards for our executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The recommendations are based on an assessment of each executives performance, including the performance of the department or departments for which the executive officer has responsibility and contributions made to the overall success of our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These executives, including our Chief Human Resources Officer, our Vice President of Total Rewards, our Chief Financial Officer and our General Counsel and Corporate Secretary, have also been involved in recommendations on the design and framework for our annual incentive plan and our equity awards, including the equity awards with vesting tied to our companys performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These executives also generally attend meetings of the Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee generally approves salaries and annual incentive awards for executive officers in executive sessions of the committee without the executive officers present.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Components of Our Compensation Program
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: SALARY
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee approves salaries for our executive officers at levels it deems appropriate based primarily on the executives level of responsibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2008, our CEO Mr. Plank voluntarily reduced his salary from $500,000 to $26,000, which was his approximate salary when he founded our company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As our largest stockholder, he believes he should be compensated for his services based primarily on our companys performance through our annual incentive plan and annual performance based equity awards as discussed below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Plank proposed and the Compensation Committee approved salary increases for 2016 for certain executive officers based in part on the continued strong performance of the leadership team in 2015 driving a 28% increase for the year in net revenues and a 15% increase for the year in operating income.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The company had finished 2015 with net revenues of $3.96 billion, and entered 2016 with a net revenues goal of $4.95 billion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following table summarizes the base salaries for our named executive officers approved by the Compensation Committee for 2016:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Named Executive   Title    2016 Base Salary   Kevin A. Plank   Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer    $  26,000    Lawrence Molloy   Chief Financial Officer    $675,000    Colin Browne   President, Global Sourcing    $550,000    Michael Lee   Chief Digital Officer    $500,000    Karl-Heinz Maurath   Chief Revenue Officer    $475,000    Brad Dickerson   Former Chief Operating Officer and Chief Financial Officer    $675,000
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Plank continued to receive a $26,000 salary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Molloy and Mr. Browne joined our company in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We negotiated their salaries with them prior to their joining our company based on their previous salaries and the level of responsibility for their positions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee approved a salary increase for Mr. Lee upon his appointment in May 2016 as Chief Digital Officer, increasing his salary from $325,000 to $500,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Maurath did not receive a raise in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to Mr. Dickerson, in October 2015, we announced his plans to leave the company during the first quarter of 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He therefore did not receive a raise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ANNUAL CASH INCENTIVE AWARD
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Plan Design and Performance Measures
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have an annual cash incentive plan for our executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the plan, executives are eligible for a cash incentive award based primarily on company performance during the year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: baseline performance measure considered for 2016 was net revenues, with the Compensation Committee considering our profitability when determining the ultimate award amounts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Net Revenues
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, company performance was assessed first on the level of net revenue growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the company achieved a certain minimum net revenue growth for 2016, then executives would be eligible for annual incentive awards under the plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management and the Compensation Committee viewed net revenue growth as a fundamental indicator of our business strength.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Operating Income
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Assuming the minimum net revenue growth was achieved, the Compensation Committee reserved its right to exercise its discretion to reduce or eliminate any annual incentive award amounts depending on our operating income growth for 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee approved targets with the expectation that award amounts would ultimately vary based on our operating income for 2016, which includes the impact of the incentive awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While the company would be required to achieve the net revenue growth target in order for any award amount to be paid under the plan, the operating income growth targets were included to further incentivize management to operate the business in a profitable manner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our annual cash incentive plan for executives for 2016 was based primarily on the overall company performance measures described above and, unlike past years, did not include any specific component tied to the performance of particular business units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management and the Compensation Committee considered it important for 2016 to align executives with the overall company results rather than being weighted on business unit performance in order to drive alignment and accountability across the leadership team.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In March 2016, the Compensation Committee approved net revenue and operating income performance goals for the annual cash incentive plan based on our business plan at the time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee approved a net revenue requirement of $4.8 billion, and set operating income growth targets for the year, specifically setting a threshold growth rate of 20%, a target growth rate of 24% and a stretch growth rate of 28%.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In May 2016 we announced that, in connection with the bankruptcy of one of our customers, our planned net revenues and operating income growth for 2016 would be lower than previously expected, and our operating income would be further impacted by the bankruptcy, primarily by a write-off of accounts receivable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Following these announcements, the Compensation Committee believed it appropriate to adjust the operating income growth targets to reflect the revised financial plan, which took these events into account.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, the committee approved reducing each of the threshold, target and stretch operating income growth targets by $56 million to account for the expected loss in revenue and related operating income impacts arising as a result of the customers bankruptcy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following is a summary of the primary performance measures considered in our annual cash incentive plan for 2016, reflecting the adjustments noted above:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 Annual Cash Incentive Plan Performance Measures    Net Revenues    Required to reach $4.8 billion to be eligible for any award (21% required growth from 2015)         Threshold    Target    Stretch      Operating Income*    $434 million    $451 million    $467 million      Growth over 2015    < 6%    10%    14%+
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: *  The operating income growth targets must include the funding for the incentive award amounts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, in order to fund higher incentive award amounts above the threshold level, the company must have achieved operating income growth levels even higher than those shown above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Incentive Award Levels
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After considering the market competitiveness of our annual cash incentive plan, the Compensation Committee determined it was appropriate to increase the target award levels under the plan and determined to do so in two steps once in 2015, and again in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For our executive officers, the committee increased the target amount under the plan for 2016 from 62.5% of annual salary to 75% of annual salary, and the stretch amount from 125% of annual salary to 150% of annual salary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee did not increase the target or stretch amount under the plan for our CEO Mr. Plank, which remained at $2.0 million and $4.0 million, respectively, for 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, the Compensation Committee set the following award target levels under our annual cash incentive plan for our named executive officers based on our operating income growth:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Threshold    Target   Stretch                (Pays at 200% of Target)       Chief Executive Officer    $0    $2.0 million   $4.0 million       Other Named Executive Officers    $0    75% of annual salary   150% of annual salary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Between the threshold amount and the target amount of operating income growth, and the target amount and stretch amount of operating income growth, the company utilizes a sliding scale to determine the payout based on the amount of funding generated by the incremental operating income growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The annual incentive amounts for all the named executive officers were set at the above levels in order to have a significant percentage of the executive officers total compensation tied primarily to corporate performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe tying a significant percentage of executive officers total compensation to corporate performance supports our objective to motivate our executives to build and profitably grow our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 Annual Cash Incentive Awards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Below is a summary of the primary performance measures considered in our annual cash incentive plan for 2016, after the adjustments described above, as compared to our results for 2016 and 2015:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2015 Results    2016 Performance Measure    2016 Results   2016 v. 2015 Results      Net Revenue       $3.96 billion       $4.8 billion       $4.83 billion    + 22%      Operating Income          Threshold    Target    Stretch             $408.5 million   $434 million   $451 million   $467 million   $417.5 million          Required Growth    < 6%    10%    14%        + 2%
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management and the Compensation Committee believed that the minimum net revenue level of $4.8 billion necessary for executives to be eligible for an annual cash incentive award for 2016 was set high enough to ensure that incentive award amounts would only be paid if we continued to demonstrate meaningful net revenue growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee then set operating income targets for 2016 in order to appropriately incentivize our management to continue to drive meaningful operating income growth, after taking into account the change to our financial plan discussed above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our 2016 net revenues of $4.83 billion exceeded the minimum net revenue level required for executives to be eligible for awards under the plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to the operating income targets, we achieved
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: $417.5 million of operating income, representing an approximately 2% increase over our 2015 actual results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This amount was below the threshold level under the plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Given that the company still achieved the net revenue growth required under the plan with a 22% increase for the year, and the significant overall efforts of the leadership team in managing the business in a challenging North America retail environment, management recommended and the Compensation Committee approved modest incentive awards for certain of our executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The award amounts were well below the target levels under the plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management and the committee also considered the payment of a modest incentive award to be an important retention tool for key executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with other executives, Messrs. Browne, Lee and Maurath received awards between 20-25% of the target amount provided under the annual cash incentive plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Plank requested that he not receive any incentive award for 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since Mr. Molloy was transitioning out of the company in early 2017, the committee did not consider him for an incentive award for 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The annual cash incentive award for our executives is primarily determined based on the company financial performance measures discussed above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the Compensation Committee considers the overall performance of our CEO and the other executive officers, and reserved its discretion to further adjust up or down the annual incentive amounts based on individual performance during the year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance reviews are generally based on a qualitative assessment of performance and consider the executives performance and the performance of the department or departments for which the executive has responsibility, as well as the contributions the executive and department are making to the overall success of Under Armour.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, the committee did not make any further adjustments to the annual cash incentive awards for the named executive officers based on individual performance, beyond the adjustments discussed above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the annual cash incentive amounts paid to the named executive officers, see the 2016 Summary Compensation Table below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EQUITY AWARDS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management and the Compensation Committee believe equity awards are an important component of executive compensation and serve to better align the interests of our executives with those of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee approves equity awards under our Second Amended and Restated 2005 Omnibus Long-Term Incentive Plan, as amended.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The purpose of the long-term incentive plan is to enhance our ability to attract and retain highly qualified executives and other persons and to motivate them to improve our business results and earnings for the long-term by providing them with equity holdings in Under Armour.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beginning in the second quarter of 2016, we began issuing equity awards for shares of our Class C Stock as equity compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While the Compensation Committee has the discretion under the terms of the plan to issue additional awards for shares of our Class A Stock, the Compensation Committee currently intends to utilize our Class C Stock for equity compensation going forward.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In early 2015, the Compensation Committee approved the grant of annual performance based restricted stock unit award to our management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Vesting of the 2015 awards were tied to our achievement of combined adjusted operating ncome targets for 2015 and 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the 2015 award, the committee set the growth targets to incentivize management o continue to drive strong operating income growth during the performance period, while at the same time reflecting the dilutive effect of our Connected Fitness related acquisitions which were completed during the first quarter of 2015.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 80% of the award would be earned if the target level was achieved, and all of the award would be earned if the stretch level was achieved.

sentences.text: Performance Based Equity Awards for 2016
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In February 2016, management recommended and the Compensation Committee approved a performance based stock option award to Mr. Plank, and performance based restricted stock unit awards to our other executive officers and other members of management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While in recent years primarily all of our executive officers have received performance based restricted stock units, the committee determined that for Mr. Plank it would further incentivize him to drive long-term shareholder value if he were awarded performance based stock options, as the options would only have value to the extent our stock price increased over the grant date value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For both the performance based stock options and restricted stock units, vesting of the award is tied to achievement by the company of a certain combined adjusted operating income target for 2016 and 2017, with 40% of the maximum amount earned if the threshold performance level is met, 80% earned if the target level is met and 100% earned if a higher stretch performance level is met.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon achievement of the performance target, the shares or options earned under the award vest in three equal annual installments beginning in February 2018, subject to the executives continued employment with the company, as an incentive for the executive to remain with the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management and the Compensation Committee believed at the time that the performance targets were set high enough to ensure that the award vests only following meaningful operating income growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management and the committee believed that adding performance conditions to the vesting was important to further incentivize our team to increase our profitability and drive long-term stockholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Similar to the adjustments made to the performance targets for the 2015 performance based stock option and restricted stock unit awards discussed above, the performance targets for these 2016 awards were adjusted by the Compensation Committee to reflect the May 2016 revision to our financial plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The employees receiving this equity award were chosen based primarily on their position and responsibilities with the company, as well as their past performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The total amount of this equity award to all employees was generally based on the total compensation expense amount related to
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 Retention Equity Awards and Equity Plan Design Changes
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Following our determination that the vesting of the 2016 performance based equity awards was not probable, and the vesting of the 2015 performance based equity awards at the 80% target level rather than the 100% stretch level, management and the Compensation Committee considered whether it would be in the best interest of the company and its stockholders to grant additional retention awards to executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee considered a number of factors when evaluating the retention awards, including:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the companys recent financial performance and the importance of the companys pay-for-performance compensation philosophy,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the amount of the 2016 performance based equity awards not expected to vest and the lower vesting level of the 2015 performance based equity awards,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: risks related to retaining key executives,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the value of unvested equity award holdings of individual executives, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the scope of responsibility, leadership and performance of individual executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

Plank    $ 0    $ 4,000,000    $ 5,000,000      Lawrence Molloy    $ 0    $ 1,600,000    $ 2,000,000      Colin Browne    $ 800,000    $ 600,000    $ 750,000      Michael Lee    $ 1,200,000    $ 1,600,000    $ 2,000,000      Karl-Heinz Maurath    $ 1,200,000    $ 2,000,000    $ 2,500,000
